title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description: Description: When the font size of a label is modified, the label's height does not change immediately.
OB: The label's height remains unchanged after modifying the font size in the UI.
EB: The label's height should be adjusted automatically after modifying the font size in the UI.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the UI.
2. Modify the font size of a label.
3. Check if the label's height is adjusted accordingly.
